about.details:
Founded in 2017, AIK Pipes and Polymers Limited manufactures pipes, HDPE fittings, MDPE pipes and PPR pipes for the water distribution, gas transmission, sewerage systems, and telecommunication sectors.

The company has 3 manufacturing facilities in Jaipur, Rajasthan which are operated on a lease basis.

The company has a competent team of engineers, technicians and operators who play an important role in the production and quality control of the products.

These products are approved by several authorities including the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS), Central Institute of Petrochemicals Engineering and Technology, Indian Oil Corporation and GAIL.

AIK Pipes is registered with the Government of Rajasthan as a supplier of water supply and sewerage management.

As of June 30, 2023, the company recorded a total income of Rs. 1400.42 lakhs and an adjusted profit after tax of Rs. 101.97 lakhs.

The company is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company. As of June 30, 2023, the company had 23 employees on its payroll.

faqs.question: What is the AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer:
AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO is a SME IPO of 1688000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.02 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹89 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on December 26, 2023, and closes on December 28, 2023.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO opens on December 26, 2023 and closes on December 28, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer: AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,42,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO will be done on Friday, December 29, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, January 1, 2024. Check the AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The AIK Pipes And Polymers IPO listing date is on Tuesday, January 2, 2024.
